edu.rit.p3.web

Class BeerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.p3.web.BeerController

  • public class BeerController
extends Object

    The instance of the BeerController class acts as the BUSINESS LAYER for the Beer Service. It utilizes a given instance of BeerJdbcManager (Data Layer) to obtain information from the Beer Database.

    Here, however there is the ability to hide potentially precious information that we would otherwise not want available to the Service Layer. Workflow is able to be enforced through this layer as well as efficient access of our data as it was intended.

    Author:
    Alex Aiezza

    • Method Detail

      • getBeers

        public List<Beer> getBeers(String token)
                    throws AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                           TokenExpiredException,
                           BeerServiceClosedException
        Takes no arguments and returns a list of the known beers.
        Parameters:
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        the beers in the database
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.

      • getCheapest

        public Beer getCheapest(String token)
                 throws AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                        TokenExpiredException,
                        BeerServiceClosedException
        Takes no arguments and returns the least expensive beer.
        Parameters:
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        The least expensive beer
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.

      • getCostliest

        public Beer getCostliest(String token)
                  throws AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                         TokenExpiredException,
                         BeerServiceClosedException
        Takes no arguments and returns the the most expensive beer.
        Parameters:
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        The most expensive beer. Returns null if no beers exist.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.

      • getPrice

        public double getPrice(String beerName,
                       String token)
                throws AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                       TokenExpiredException,
                       BeerServiceClosedException
        Takes a string denoting the beer brand and returns a double representing the beer price.
        Parameters:
        beerName - the name of the beer to get the price of
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        The price of the given beer
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.

      • getSortedBeers

        private List<Beer> getSortedBeers()
        Gets all beers and sorts them by price
        Returns:
        Beers sorted by price

      • getToken

        public String getToken(String username,
                       String password)
                throws UserNotFoundException,
                       UserUnderageException,
                       MismatchingPasswordException
        Takes a string denoting the username, a string denoting a password and returns a "token" string if the username and password match.
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        a token that will expire after a certain amount of time. This is null if user does not exist.
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - Thrown if the given username is not found
        UserUnderageException - Thrown when an underage user attempts to become authorized
        MismatchingPasswordException - In which case, the given password does not match the password for the given username in the database, this exception is thrown.

      • setPrice

        public boolean setPrice(String beerName,
                        double price,
                        String token)
                 throws AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                        TokenExpiredException,
                        BeerServiceClosedException,
                        UserHasInsufficientPrivilegesException,
                        BeerNotFoundException
        Takes a string denoting the beer brand and a double denoting the price returns true or false depending on success.
        Parameters:
        beerName - the name of the beer to set the price of
        price - the new price of the given beer
        token - authentication token for accessing this method
        Returns:
        true if the new price was set
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.
        UserHasInsufficientPrivilegesException - Thrown if the user associated with the given authentication token has insufficient privileges for accessing this method.
        BeerNotFoundException - Thrown when a beer name cannot be found in the database

      • verifyToken

        private void verifyToken(String tokenHash)
                  throws AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException,
                         TokenExpiredException,
                         BeerServiceClosedException
        This method is called locally within an instance of the BeerController in methods that perform operations that require authentication.
        Parameters:
        tokenHash - the authentication token string
        Throws:
        AuthorizationTokenNotFoundException - Thrown if the tokenHash given does not exist.
        TokenExpiredException - Thrown when the tokenHash given is expired.
        BeerServiceClosedException - Thrown if the Beer Service is being accessed outside of working hours.
